name: Fruit and Vegie Bag - NEW AND IMPROVED COMING SOON !!!
description:
Its the greenest shopping bag of them all !!

Reusable, sustainable, organic, eco-friendly.

100% organic cotton fruit and vegie bag bag.

Extra strong and durable - 4.3oz muslin/gauze.

Get rid of those supermarket plastic bags forever! Store fruit and vegies in the refrigerator.

Reuse again and again and again!

These really are the Rolls Royce of organic cotton bags!

The Organic Mamas products are made from 100% organic cotton and are free from dyes or chemicals.

PLEASE NOTE: FRUIT AND VEGETABLES ARE NOT INCLUDED! BAGS ONLY FOR SALE!

Made in Australia.

ALL PRICES ARE AUSTRALIAN DOLLARS - $AUD

name: Big Mama Shopping Bag
description:
Its the greenest shopping bag of them all !!

Reusable, sustainable, organic, eco-friendly.

100% organic cotton shopping bag.

Extra strong and durable - 10 oz canvas.

Great size for a grocery shop.
Measures approx 43cm wide,  32cm high & 11cm deep.

These really are the Rolls Royce of organic cotton bags!

The Organic Mamas products are made from 100% organic cotton and are free from dyes or chemicals.

PLEASE NOTE: GROCERY ITEMS ARE NOT INCLUDED! BAGS ONLY FOR SALE!

Made in India - SKAL Certified.

ALL PRICES ARE AUSTRALIAN DOLLARS - $AUD

name: Little Mama Shopping Bag
description:
Its the greenest shopping bag of them all !!

Reusable, sustainable, organic, eco-friendly.

100% organic cotton shopping bag.

Extra strong and durable - 10 oz canvas.

Great size for a quick shop, a couple of bottles of wine or even as a kid's library bag.
Measures approx 31cm high and 29cm wide at the top and 25cm wide at the bottom.

These really are the Rolls Royce of organic cotton bags!

The Organic Mamas products are made from 100% organic cotton and are free from dyes or chemicals.

PLEASE NOTE: WINE IS NOT INCLUDED! BAGS ONLY FOR SALE!

Made in India - SKAL Certified.

ALL PRICES ARE AUSTRALIAN DOLLARS - $AUD

name: hand block printed bag - big mama - red love hearts or green apples
description:
Another beautiful collaboration from The Organic Mamas and Birchseed!

100% organic cotton shopping bag, extra strong and durable - 10 oz canvas, lovingly hand block printed with 100% solvent free, water-based, non-toxic inks (Permaset Aqua) by Nikki from birchseed in her lovely studio in Murwillumbah, Northern NSW. Nikki's method allows her the time and space to SLOW down and enjoy an artful process whist being a stay at home mum. The uniqueness of each print matches perfecty with the texture of the organic canvas fabric.

choose from either red love hearts or green apples........

Reusable, sustainable, organic, eco-friendly - Its the greenest (and most unique) shopping bag of them all !!

Great size for a grocery shop or a beach bag or just an every day kind of bag.
Measures approx 43cm wide, 32cm high & 11cm deep.

These really are the Rolls Royce of organic cotton bags!

The Organic Mamas products are made from 100% organic cotton and are free from dyes or chemicals.

Made in India - SKAL Certified. Printed by hand in Australia.
